name: Kenny Weathers
location: Cottonwood Cove, in the slave pen
descriptions: Kenny Weathers is capture held in Cottonwood Cove in 2281.
Along with his mother and sister, Kenny was captured by Caesar's Legion when attempting to relocate in the Mojave Wasteland. His father, Frank Weathers, fled during their capture.

topics.topic_text: Relax, this'll be over quickly. <Set off the explosive in his collar>
I've paid for your freedom. You're free to go.
topics.response_text: {Doesn't make sense}Why free me now? After what you done? I ain't saying thank you.
No way! I seen what happens when you mess with these collars!

topics.topic: VFreeformCottonwoodCoveNVCCKennyWeathersTopic005Hold still. <Deactivate the charge and remove his collar>
topics.topic_text: RF detonator? Give me a second.<Deactivate the charge and remove his collar>
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Hey, you did it! Nice work!

topics.topic_text: Never mind. I'll see if there is another way to free you.
topics.response_text: Good idea. I'd like to keep my head intact.
Sorry, I'm just glad someone is doing something. The last thing I need is to be made some legionaire's bitch and sent off to God knows where.

topics.topic_text: <Give Kenny the key from Canyon Runner>
topics.response_text: {Shocked disbelief}Freedom? Thank God Frank thinks we're enslaved.

topics.topic_text: I've paid for your freedom. You're free to go.
topics.response_text: {Shocked disbelief}Freedom? Thank God Frank thinks we're enslaved.

topics.topic_text: <Give Kenny the key from Canyon Runner>
